Before installing this dlc, I opened My theta version of ac3 and it automatically downloaded the 1.03 patch, same with the previous 1.02 patch, if it does not download a 1.03 patch then try reinstalling maybe?

for theta version use 1.03 russian update and u have to go to temp files while opening the update , search for the last created file i think its name is like (3453tvrgdfhgyut6ruvghcx) open it then open delta u will find multi files delete it as theta version doesnt have multi files then press next in the update

u can use the auto patch file it will download the proper update

@sahil.sun - let the game automatically update to latest version. Then apply Theta crack (you can find it easily, just google it, try on gamescopyworld). Finally copy theta unlocker into your save game folder.

Note: 1. as memo81 said theta crack can work on any version game, so dont worry about the version of the crack you download.

2. again as memo81 said rename " 4.save " to " 1.save " before copy it to your save game folder..

3. At last dont forget to backup your save game.

Does this work on Black Box version,and how to install it, plz help!

@sahil as i mentioned these problem in a comment the error is about multi files so u first open the update the choose i accept the terms i know the language in russian but u will figure it now dont press next while the update is opening , open temp files u will find it in user name - app data - local - temp, then open the last created file its name will be something like that {ac142160-45b3-4545-83b8-6382cada6170} then u will find delta files open it u will find multi delete that folder ther return to the update and press next u will have no problems
